name: Wizard Unretired
description:
A game created in 1 week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

All music and sound created for this jam by Alexandru Oprisan: AlexO#7464
All gameplay elements created for this jam by Garrett Gibbs: PNGUIN#2034

This was our first time collaborating and we had a ton of fun!

Mouse controls for the entirety of the game.
Esc to access the settings menu.

Very special thank you for assistance from:

  • Savana St. Aubin : Graphic Design
  • Stephanie Gibbs: Writing
